column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S at Exit 99 (Old Richmond Rd):
column4: The exit ramp is shut down until approximately 7 p.m. due to a garbage truck with trailer that overturned on the ramp.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S at Exit 99 (Old Richmond Rd):
column4: No lanes are blocked on I-75S, but traffic is backed up in the area.  Use added caution.
Wednesday March 13 thru Saturday March 16 at Rupp Arena.
Expect increased congestion if traveling downtown, use added caution, and watch for pedestrians.
